item.title: ECOM6013 Technologies and E-Commerce Trends
item.description: Emerging Technology Trends Gartner hype cycle for emerging technologies, 2019 Gartner hype cycle for emerging technologies, 2020 The top 10 strategic technologies for 2020 The Gartner top 10 strategic technology trends for 2020 highlight trends that will drive significant disruption and opportunity over the next five to 10 years. These trends have a profound impact on the people and the spaces they inhabit, rather than building a technology stack and then exploring the potential applications, organizations must consider the business and human contexts first.
